documentation.text: @title Factory for creating new mintable and burnable tokens.

attributes.text: @title Factory for creating new mintable and burnable tokens.

createToken(string,string,uint8).details: The caller will become the only minter and burner and the new owner capable of assigning the roles.

params.tokenDecimals: used to define the precision used in the token's numerical representation.
params.tokenName: used to describe the new token.
params.tokenSymbol: short ticker abbreviation of the name. Ideally < 5 chars.

returns.newToken: an instance of the newly created token interface.

devdoc.title: Factory for creating new mintable and burnable tokens.

createToken(string,string,uint8).notice: Create a new token and return it to the caller.
